1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Queue.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude.Queue
6  ( -- * Data type
7    Queue,
8
9    -- * Construction
10    qFrom, qTo,
11    qNull, qLength,
12
13    -- * Enqueue and dequeue
14    enq, enqs, deq,
15  ) where
16
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Prelude.Import   as B
18
19
20-- --------------------------------------------  Data type
21
22-- | First-in first-out list.
23data Queue a = Queue [a] [a]
24    deriving (Eq, Ord)
25
26instance (Show a) => Show (Queue a) where
27    show q = "Queue " ++ show (qTo q)
28
29-- | Empty queue
30instance B.Default (Queue a) where
31    def = Queue [] []
32
33
34-- --------------------------------------------  Construction
35
36-- | Create queue from list.
37qFrom :: [a] -> Queue a
38qFrom = Queue []
39
40-- | Convert queue to list.
41qTo :: Queue a -> [a]
42qTo (Queue qi qo) = qo ++ reverse qi
43
44-- | Test queue is empty.
45qNull :: Queue a -> Bool
46qNull (Queue [] [])  = True
47qNull _              = False
48
49-- | Number of elements in queue.
50qLength :: Queue a -> Int
51qLength (Queue qi qo) = length qi + length qo
52
53
54-- --------------------------------------------  Enqueue and dequeue
55
56-- | Enqueue element.
57--
58--   >>> enq 2 $ enq 1 (B.def :: Queue Int)
59--   Queue [1,2]
60enq :: a -> Queue a -> Queue a
61enq a (Queue qi qo) = Queue (a : qi) qo
62
63-- | Enqueue multiple elements.
64--
65--   >>> enqs [1,2,3] (B.def :: Queue Int)
66--   Queue [1,2,3]
67enqs :: [a] -> Queue a -> Queue a
68enqs ls (Queue qi qo) = Queue (reverse ls ++ qi) qo
69
70-- | Dequeue.
71--
72--   >>> deq $ enq 2 $ enq 1 (B.def :: Queue Int)
73--   (Just 1, Queue [2])
74--
75--   >>> deq (B.def :: Queue Int)
76--   (Nothing, Queue [])
77deq :: Queue a -> (Maybe a, Queue a)
78deq (Queue qi (a : qo))  = (Just a,  Queue qi qo)
79deq (Queue [] [])        = (Nothing, Queue [] [])
80deq (Queue qi [])        = deq (Queue [] $ reverse qi)
81
